name: BeadsPopper
description:
BeadsPopper is a casual tile-matching puzzle game with a simple RPG element. Battle against adorable monster girls by popping colorful beads!



You pop accumulating beads by matching their colors, triggering effects and fight the opponent with them!

Features

  • Unique gameplay blending tile-matching puzzles with simple RPG-style battles
  • Face off against 6 animated opponents
  • Compete for high scores and times, and test your skills to the limit
  • Unlock Gallery mode to enjoy animations closely
